title: Ed Luce Defends Cricket...and Trump Admits Treason: What a Summer!
description:
Did you know that Ed Luce was once on a cricket team that Imran Khan occasionally would coach during breaks in his high profile high society dating life?  That Rosa Brooks briefly played on a cricket team at Oxford?  That Kori went to a cricket match and was not bored to tears?  Well, you will if you listen to this episode of Deep State Radio which also has the president admitting to a felony, America's Iran policy going from bad to worse and Israel's Nation-State Law giving apartheid a fresh new look for the 21st Century.  Tune in!Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/deepstateradio.
